name: Zombieland (DaneCarstens)
description:
Fight off the zombies! 

Team Lead/Programmer - Rigel Kuper
Programmer - Dane Carstens
Programmer - Matthew Fernandez
Level Design - Charles Lee
Writer/Sound - Elizabeth Chen

Find ammo, and pick up health and speed boosts to get an edge

WASD to move, left click to shoot, scroll wheel to switch weapons
